resources.string: Choose the number that is higher.\nThe polls can be repeated until you score 20 points.

"Поздравляем! Уровень пройден!\nDid you know that the number 7 is considered the happiest number? There are 7 days in a week, 7 continents, 7 colors of the rainbow, 7 musical notes and much more. Also, the number 7 is psychologically impressive to most people in the world.
Choose the number that is higher.\nThe polls can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations! The level is passed!\nDid you know that there is no zero in Roman numerals?"
Select a fraction with a higher value.\nThe polls can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations! The level is passed!Operations on fractions in the Middle Ages were considered the most difficult area of mathematics"
Choose an edible item.\nThe polls can be repeated until you score 20 points.
"Congratulations! The level is passed!\nEverything can be eaten. It's just that some items are only used once."
